sentences.sContent: Mary Ann turned and rapped on Charlie's door.
sentences.sCn: 玛丽·安转过身急敲查理的门。

sentences.sContent: ...rapping the glass with the knuckles of his right hand.
sentences.sCn: …用他右手的指关节敲击玻璃。

synos.tran: 抢走；轻敲；敲击致使；使着迷

phrases.pCn: [美俚]逃过刑事责任；摆脱困境
不公正的惩罚；不公正的判决；责骂

trans.tranCn: 敲击， 急敲；责备， 训斥
trans.tranOther: If you rap on something or rap it, you hit it with a series of quick blows

trans.tranCn: 敲击， 急敲；说唱音乐
trans.tranOther: a type of popular music in which the words of a song are not sung, but spoken in time to music with a steady beat
